begin_quest_text: Clear game starting screens...
subquest_list: Game starts: spam start button until starting dialog with Oak is seen.
Choose 'New Game'
Name yourself and press START
Name your rival and press START
Spam B to clear the menus until you load into the game. You will find yourself in "Players House Second Floor."
end_quest_text: Starting screens cleared! Let's gooooooo!

begin_quest_text: Go touch grass.
subquest_list: Complete quest 001.
Navigate to the stairs in the upper right corner.
Head down and a little left to exit the house.
end_quest_text: go touch grass.

begin_quest_text: Try to leave Pallet Town directly to the north. Oak will get you and bring you to his lab.
subquest_list: Complete quest 002.
Try to leave Pallet Town directly to the north. Oak will get you and bring you to his lab.
end_quest_text: Why is it always 'Back to the lab!' with you, Oak?

begin_quest_text: Pick a pokemon. charmander is closest to you.
subquest_list: Complete quest 003.
Pick a pokemon. charmander is closest to you.
Try to leave and your rival will battle you.
Battle your rival, first using growl, then using scratch or tackle.
Once the battle is over, progress through the dialogs.
Leave Oaks Lab.
end_quest_text: Get rekt, scrub. See ya, pops! Oh yeah, I'm gonna be the best there ever was, the best there ever will be!

event_triggers.comment: Ensures rival battle in Oak's lab was won

begin_quest_text: Walk up to exit Pallet Town.
subquest_list: Complete quest 004.
Walk up to exit Pallet Town.
end_quest_text: Something tells me I haven't seen the last of this bucolic backwater.

begin_quest_text: Walk up Route 1 to the first NPC and talk to him.
subquest_list: Complete quest 005.
Walk up Route 1 to the first NPC.
Talk to the NPC.
end_quest_text: Sweet! Thanks for the potion, guy. Maybe I should check out Viridian City Poke Mart...

begin_quest_text: Walk up Route 1 to Viridian City.
subquest_list: Complete quest 006.
Follow Route 1 north.
Keep going until you get to Viridian City.
end_quest_text: Route 1 has been traversed, and I find myself in Viridian City.

begin_quest_text: Find and enter the Poke Mart in Viridian City.
subquest_list: Complete quest 007.
Find the Poke Mart in Viridian City.
Walk up, past the Poke Center, and slightly to the right.
You will see the Poke Mart.
Enter the Poke Mart.
end_quest_text: Thirsty. I guess Mom didn't pack me a drink.

begin_quest_text: Receive parcel from the Poke Mart clerk.
subquest_list: Complete quest 008.
Receive parcel from the Poke Mart clerk.
Then, leave the Poke Mart.
end_quest_text: I'm not sure what I'm supposed to do with this parcel. I'll just hold onto it for now.

begin_quest_text: Leave Viridian City.
subquest_list: Complete quest 009.
Walk down and left to leave Viridian City.
You will be back on Route 1.
end_quest_text: There's no such thing as a free lunch, huh?

begin_quest_text: Return to Pallet Town and enter Oak's Lab.
subquest_list: Complete quest 010.
Head down Route 1 from Viridian City until you reach Pallet Town.
Once in Pallet Town, head down and to the right to find Professor Oak's Lab.
Enter Oak's Lab.
end_quest_text: A wild sense of déjà vu washes over me—back to Oak's Lab, again.

begin_quest_text: Speak to Professor Oak to advance the plot.
subquest_list: Complete quest 011.
Walk straight up in Oak's Lab until you are standing in front of Oak.
Press A to interact with Professor Oak.
end_quest_text: Professor Oak, dispensing wisdom—and plot devices.

begin_quest_text: Leave Oak's Lab to return to Pallet Town.
subquest_list: Complete quest 012.
Travel downward in Oak's Lab until you walk out the door.
You will be back in Pallet Town.
end_quest_text: Escape velocity achieved. Farewell, Oak's Lab!

begin_quest_text: Go to Blue's House to get the Town Map.
subquest_list: Complete quest 013.
Navigate to Blues House, up and to the right from Oak's Lab.
Enter Blues House.
end_quest_text: The journey of a thousand steps begins with a... map.

begin_quest_text: Get the Town Map from Blue's sister.
subquest_list: Complete quest 014.
Go up in Blues House until you are standing in front of Blue's sister.
Press A to interact and receive the Town Map.
Leave Blues House.
end_quest_text: If only real siblings were this helpful.

begin_quest_text: Exit Pallet Town to the north.
subquest_list: Complete quest 015.
Proceed to the left and north to exit Pallet Town.
You will be on Route 1.
end_quest_text: Grass, bugs, and the open road: my adventure resumes.

begin_quest_text: Travel up Route 1 to reach Viridian City.
subquest_list: Complete quest 016.
Proceed up Route 1.
Continue north until you reach Viridian City.
Enter the Viridian City Poke Center.
end_quest_text: Made it to Viridian City—my Pokémon are crying for mercy.

event_triggers.comment: Viridian City -> Viridian City Poke Center

begin_quest_text: Heal your Pokémon at the Viridian City Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 017.
Walk straight up in the Poke Center until you are standing in front of Nurse Joy.
Press A to interact with Nurse Joy.
Press A a few more times to heal your Pokémon.
Exit the dialogue.
end_quest_text: All patched up and ready for more bad decisions.

begin_quest_text: Leave the Viridian City Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 018.
Proceed downwards to leave the Poke Center.
You will find yourself back in Viridian City.
end_quest_text: That distinct aroma of urban grass and commerce.

begin_quest_text: Find and enter the Viridian City Pokémart.
subquest_list: Complete quest 019.
Proceed to the right, then up to find the Viridian City Pokémart.
Walk up and right to get to the Viridian City Pokémart.
Enter the Pokémart.
end_quest_text: Time to trade hard-earned cash for Pokéballs and dreams.

begin_quest_text: Buy items at the Viridian City Pokémart.
subquest_list: Complete quest 020.
Walk up to the counter and talk to the clerk.
Walk up two tiles and left one tile to be in front of the clerk.
Press A to interact with the clerk.
end_quest_text: The sacred ritual of capitalism, Pokémon style.

begin_quest_text: Purchase Pokéballs.
subquest_list: Complete quest 021.
Select 'Buy' by pressing A when the cursor is on Buy.
Move the cursor to Pokéball and press A.
Press the up arrow until 4 is selected.
Press A to confirm the purchase.
Press A again to finalize the Pokéball purchase.
Exit the dialogue and the Pokémart.
end_quest_text: Shopping spree complete. My wallet is empty but my bag is full.

begin_quest_text: Catch a Nidoran♂ on Route 22.
subquest_list: Complete quest 022.
Head left from Viridian City to Route 22.
Walk in the grass surrounded by a fence, a ledge, and a wall.
If a wild Pokémon appears and it's a Nidoran♂: attack it with Scratch twice, then catch it with a Pokéball.
If it is not a Nidoran♂, defeat it in battle.
If your Pokémon gets low in health, use a Potion.
Repeat until you have caught a Nidoran♂.
end_quest_text: Welcome to the squad, Nidoran♂! Sorry, Pidgey.

begin_quest_text: Trigger the rival battle on Route 22.
subquest_list: Complete quest 023.
Walk up through the gap in the ledge, then left.
Your rival will intercept you.
end_quest_text: Can't take two steps without being challenged. Classic.

begin_quest_text: Defeat your rival on Route 22.
subquest_list: Complete quest 024.
For each of your rival's Pokémon, use Growl first, once.
Then use Scratch until that Pokémon faints.
If your Pokémon gets low on health, use a Potion instead of attacking.
Repeat until your rival has no Pokémon left.
end_quest_text: Rival has been served a hot plate of humble pie.

begin_quest_text: Head north from Viridian City toward Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 025.
Walk back to the middle of Viridian City.
Heal at the Pokecenter as usual.
Travel north from the center of Viridian City onto Route 2.
As you travel north, approach the cuttable tree to your left.
Press A at the tree to receive a free Potion.
Return to the main path and continue north until you reach the guardhouse.
Enter the guardhouse.
end_quest_text: Nature hike complete. One free Potion richer.

begin_quest_text: Proceed through the guardhouse to Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 026.
Proceed straight up through the guardhouse and exit out the north door.
You will enter Viridian Forest.
end_quest_text: I've emerged in Viridian Forest, where every bush rustles menacingly.

begin_quest_text: Begin exploring Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 027.
Proceed slightly north in Viridian Forest.
Go to the right, stopping when you see the second NPC.
end_quest_text: Dodged a few Weedles, but there's more bug-catching to come.

event_triggers.comment: Player has navigated to the area of the second NPC / first trainer battle of quest 029. Precise coord check or pre-battle dialog for trainer 1 would be better.

begin_quest_text: Eliminate the first trainer in Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 028.
Proceed north from the second NPC.
A trainer will see you and initiate a battle.
Use Ember (which Charmander should now know) to quickly defeat all bug Pokémon.
Heal with Potions if necessary.
end_quest_text: Charcoal grilled: bug Pokémon edition.

begin_quest_text: Take out the next trainer in Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 029.
Proceed north and engage the next trainer you encounter.
Use Ember or your strongest moves to win.
Heal if needed.
end_quest_text: Another trainer, another burnt offering.

begin_quest_text: Navigate to the exit of Viridian Forest.
subquest_list: Complete quest 030.
Go up all the way you can, then left all the way you can, then down, then left, then up, then left, then down, then left, then up.
Battle the last trainer, then proceed straight up and keep going to exit Viridian Forest.
end_quest_text: Light at the end of the forest. Goodbye, bug catchers.

begin_quest_text: Travel through Route 2 to Pewter City.
subquest_list: Complete quest 031.
Proceed north through Route 2 after exiting Viridian Forest.
Continue north and a little east to reach Pewter City.
Find the Poke Center and enter it.
end_quest_text: Now entering Pewter City: Home of big rocks and bigger egos.

begin_quest_text: Heal your Pokémon at Pewter City's Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 032.
Once in Pewter City, enter the Pokémon Center (left side of the city).
Walk straight up to Nurse Joy.
Press A to interact and heal your Pokémon.
Exit the dialogue.
Leave the Poke Center.
end_quest_text: Back to the familiar embrace of free healthcare.

begin_quest_text: Visit Pewter City's Pokémon Mart.
subquest_list: Complete quest 033.
Proceed to the right and north in Pewter City to the Pokémart.
Enter the Pokémart.
Walk up to the clerk and press A to interact.
end_quest_text: A new city, a new chance to stimulate the local economy.

begin_quest_text: Stock up on Potions at Pewter City's Pokémart.
subquest_list: Complete quest 034.
Buy as many Potions as possible.
Leave the Pokémart.
end_quest_text: I own more Potions than the local hospital.

begin_quest_text: Approach Pewter City Gym.
subquest_list: Complete quest 035.
Proceed left to clear the Pokémart.
Proceed north to clear the Gym.
Proceed left to walk behind the Gym.
Proceed down to walk beside the Gym.
Proceed right to walk in front of the Gym to the Gym door.
Proceed up to enter the Gym.
end_quest_text: This is it. Gym 1. Time to rock.

begin_quest_text: Battle the first trainer in Pewter City Gym.
subquest_list: Complete quest 036.
Proceed straight up to the first trainer in the Gym.
For each Pokémon the trainer has, use Growl first, then your strongest attack.
Heal if necessary.
After winning, return to the Pokémon Center if you need to heal.
Retrace your path from the Gym to the Pokémon Center.
Heal your Pokémon at the Pewter City Pokémon Center.
When healed, return to the Gym to battle Brock.
end_quest_text: Grok vs Brok: throwdown!!

begin_quest_text: Return to Pewter City Gym for your badge battle.
subquest_list: Complete quest 037.
Leave the Pokecenter.
Retrace your steps from the Pokémon Center back to Pewter City Gym.
Enter the Gym.
end_quest_text: The rematch: it's time for Brock.

begin_quest_text: Challenge and defeat Brock at Pewter City Gym.
subquest_list: Complete quest 038.
Proceed straight up to Brock until you are directly in front of him.
Press A to challenge Brock.
Defeat Brock using your best tactics.
Exit all dialogues and leave the Gym to the south.
end_quest_text: Rock solid victory. One badge down, a bunch more to go.

begin_quest_text: Heal at the Pokémon Center in Pewter City after your badge win.
subquest_list: Complete quest 039.
Head to the Pokémon Center and enter it.
end_quest_text: Healing: an essential post-gym ritual.

begin_quest_text: Restore your Pokémon at Pewter City's Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 040.
Heal at the Pokémon Center.
When done, leave the Pokémon Center.
end_quest_text: Team is healed. Ready to roll.

begin_quest_text: Exit Pewter City to the right onto Route 3.
subquest_list: Complete quest 041.
Exit Pewter City by heading right.
You will enter Route 3.
end_quest_text: New zone, new challenges. Route 3, here we come.

begin_quest_text: Begin your journey across Route 3.
subquest_list: Complete quest 042.
Proceed right on Route 3.
Battle trainers along the way.
Level up your Nidoran using switch training: start with Charmander, use Scratch, then switch to Nidoran and use Tackle.
Don't let Nidoran faint. If needed, heal with Potions.
Continue until you reach the far right of Route 3.
end_quest_text: Nidoran is beefing up, trainers are in tears.

event_triggers.comment: Player has reached the eastern end of Route 3, ready for Route 4 transition. This may need to be tied to defeating all/most trainers on Route 3 or Nidoran reaching a certain level.

begin_quest_text: Transition from Route 3 to Route 4.
subquest_list: Complete quest 043.
At the end of Route 3, backtrack slightly in not aligned with the doorway lead up.
Align with the doorway leading up, and walk upwards.
Continue north until you reach Route 4.
end_quest_text: Stepping into Route 4—almost time for a mountain adventure.

begin_quest_text: Travel up Route 4 to the Mt. Moon Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 044.
Proceed upwards on Route 4.
Enter the Mt. Moon Pokémon Center.
end_quest_text: Rest stop before the infamous Mt. Moon grind.

begin_quest_text: Heal and buy a Magikarp at the Mt. Moon Pokémon Center.
subquest_list: Complete quest 045.
Heal at the Pokémon Center as usual.
Talk to the man walking around inside the Pokémon Center.
Buy the Magikarp from him.
Exit the Pokémon Center.
end_quest_text: Now the proud owner of a flopping Magikarp. What could go wrong?
